title: CANCAN KERN: Bio-Acoustic Monitoring & Isotopic Debris Forensic Vault
description: Proprietary SGO v1.3 architecture for real-time Bio-Acoustic monitoring of BSFL (Black Soldier Fly Larvae) and 100-year forensic forecasting of debris piles. Includes BALRL™ (Bio-Acoustic Layered Response Logic) and Isotopic Fingerprinting metadata.
notes: Copyright 2026 CANCAN KERN. All Rights Reserved. Bio-Acoustic Monitoring of BSFL pilot is protected under SGO Adaptive Master Strategy. BALRL™ is a pending trademark.
